episodes.title: Therapist & Cult Survivor Explains How Narcassists Trap Us
episodes.description:
Narcissistic abuse doesn’t begin with cruelty. It begins with connection.

In this episode of Girl, Wake Up!, Amy Polacko sits down with licensed psychotherapist Vanessa Reiser, LCSW, to unpack how narcissists condition, confuse and trap even the smartest, strongest women-and what it actually takes to break free. 

Vanessa is the author of Narcissistic Abuse: A Therapist’s Guide to Identifying, Escaping, and Healing from Toxic and Manipulative People. A two-time Ironman, she has run across multiple states in a wedding dress to raise awareness about narcissistic abuse and survivor empowerment. Together, we explore how love-bombing turns into control, why gaslighting erodes self-trust, and how trauma bonds keep women stuck long after the red flags appear.
But this episode isn’t just about the trap.It’s about the comeback.

Vanessa shares how she rebuilt her identity, reclaimed her power and transformed her pain into purpose.

If you’ve ever wondered:

Was it really that bad?
Why did I stay so long?
Why do I still miss him?

This conversation will help you understand the psychology-and reclaim your clarity.

Find out more about Vanessa Reiser and follow her:
https://tellatherapist.net/
Instagram: @vanessareiserlcsw
Get her book: Narcissistic Abuse
